metadata.title: CVE-2021-3918 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
json-schema is vulnerable to Improperly Controlled Modification of ObjectPrototype Attributes ('Prototype Pollution')

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3918` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-json-schema - 0.2.3-1+deb10u1build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-json-schema package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.2.3-1+deb10u1build0.18.04.1').
